body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Paul Brown and the customer's name is Karen Lopez.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Paul Brown and I am a representative of MetaCar, your dedicated car rental agency.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Paul, my name is Karen Lopez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Karen! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling quite frustrated with my recent booking.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Karen. I want to help resolve this issue for you. Could you please provide me with your booking reference number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s four five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. Now, could you also tell me the last four digits of your mobile phone number for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Let me check your booking and see what went wrong.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Karen. I will resolve this for you shortly. Thank you for your time today!
